GCRI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 210 Resident Medical officer, Dental Surgeon and Other Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 16, 2025, 11:36 IST
 Gujarat Cancer and Research Institute
 210 Jobs |  Posted On : 16-Aug-2025 |  Gujarat |  Salary : 56,100 to 218,200




FOLLOW

Gujarat Cancer and Research Institute (GCRI) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 210 Professor, Associate Professor, Assistant Professor, Resident Medical Officer, Senior Resident, Dental Surgeon, and other positions. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, 12th, B.Sc, MBBS, BDS, Post Graduation, MD/ MS, M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the GCRI Recruitment 2025. Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Gujarat.

GCRI Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Professor	94	Post Graduation
Associate Professor
Assistant Professor
Resident Medical Officer	01	Post Graduation, MBBS, MD/ MS
Dental Surgeon	01	BDS
Medical Officer	16	MBBS
Visit the official website for more vacancy details and educational qualifications

Age Limit for the GCRI Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years
The Maximum Age Limit: 45 years.

Selection Process for the GCRI Recruitment 2025

Short List
Interview

Salary Structure for the GCRI Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 56,100 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 2,18,200 /- per month.

Application fee for the GCRI Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the GCRI Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Professor notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Register with your email and password..
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and take a printout of the application form for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	15-08-2025
Last Date of Application	28-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
